nodes.text: This model of Rakatan ship was used by the Rakatan Infinite Empire.

These vessels were created after the Kwa uplifted the Rakata civilization of Lehon who were taught the power of the Force and were given advanced technology. With these gifts, the Rakata began a campaign of conquest where they conquered, enslaved and destroyed worlds with fleets of these starships.

The Devourer was a ship of this design. It crashed on the planet Tython, with all but one crewmember lost. On the planet, the Je'daii had a Force vision of a fleet of these craft that were present at the Star Forge.
